name: Tree Assign Unique Node IDs

outputs.description: tree with unique IDs on the nodes
outputs.name: treeWithIDs

script:
# this routine traverses a phylo tree in nested format. Add a nodeid and then
# increment the count every time we encounter a node during a depth first search

nodecount = 1

def addUniqueIDsToTreeNodes(treenode):
    global nodecount
    treenode['node_data']['nodeid'] = nodecount
    nodecount += 1
    # look at the current tree node and see if there are children or not
    if 'children' in treenode.keys():
        #case for a hierarchy node, traverse to all the children
        for node in treenode['children']:
            addUniqueIDsToTreeNodes(node)
        
    
# here are the top level actions, add locations and output the tree

addUniqueIDsToTreeNodes(tree)
treeWithIDs = tree
